title: #44 Lu's Bologna Sandwich
itunes:title: #44 Lu's Bologna Sandwich
itunes:subtitle: Danny is Whitney-less as he welcomes Emmy-nominated writer Michael Ross to recap this week's #RHONY. In this episode, the girls headed off to a spa to detox and unwind after Lu's arrest/forced bologna sandwich. Danny also fills everyone in on...
description:
Danny is Whitney-less as he welcomes Emmy-nominated writer Michael Ross to recap this week's #RHONY. In this episode, the girls headed off to a spa to detox and unwind after Lu's arrest/forced bologna sandwich. Danny also fills everyone in on an unfortunate mailing mishap.


*For bonus episodes, join the Patreon at www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

Web: acast.com/EverythingIconic

Web: www.EverythingIconic.com

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

*Sponsored by Samson Technologies (SamsonTech.com)


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
